ygData.subject: Re: animation file?
ygData.msgSnippet: That seems really odd, I would think if one character had it they all should.  I personally don tknow how to fix it Mystik, but i did notice that my wood elf
ygData.messageBody:
That seems really odd, I would think if one character had it they all
should. I personally don'tknow how to fix it Mystik, but i did notice that
my wood elf female does not have an at ease pose. The other new graphics
with her are fine though.

Bree
----- Original Message -----
From: Mystik <mystik@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 2:47 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] animation file?


> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> ok it's weird <dunno how this happened...some glitch when i was dropped
> one time or something like that...who knows>...i create a new char, and
> they will have the relaxing-while-standing-still animations, but my
> current chars don't...anyone know the name of the file that has those
> animes so i can delete it and d/l it again so my current chars will have
> the animes too?
>
> (\/)ystix
>
> >
